alert.note: Alert for Redwood (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 12:23AM CDT until April 25 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Redwood River near Redwood Falls affecting Redwood County. .Heavy rain this evening has brought the river back up to near flood stage with rises likely continuing into Thursday. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Redwood River near Redwood Falls. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Low lying areas, mainly farmland, and some roads along the river begin to experience flooding; bottom of Swayback bridge * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1200 AM CDT Thursday, the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early this morning to 6.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight to 5.9 feet Saturday morning. It will rise above flood stage again early Saturday afternoon to 6.3 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage again Monday evening. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.2 feet on 06/28/2010. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
